mapper.insert: insert into cart_tbl(pro_num, mbsp_id, cart_amount) values (#{pro_num}, #{mbsp_id}, #{cart_amount}) on duplicate key update cart_amount = cart_amount + #{cart_amount}
mapper.select: select p.pro_num, p.pro_name, p.pro_price, p.pro_up_folder, p.pro_img, c.cart_amount from cart_tbl c inner join product_tbl p on c.pro_num = p.pro_num where c.mbsp_id = #{mbsp_id}
select sum(p.pro_price * c.cart_amount) as total_price from cart_tbl c inner join product_tbl p on c.pro_num = p.pro_num where c.mbsp_id = #{mbsp_id}

select c.pro_num, c.mbsp_id, p.pro_name, p.pro_up_folder, p.pro_img, p.pro_price, c.cart_amount, c.cart_amount * p.pro_price as unitprice from cart_tbl c inner join product_tbl p on c.pro_num = p.pro_num where c.mbsp_id = #{mbspId}
